basics.name: Gian Franco Marcano
basics.label: Full stack developer
basics.summary: Passionate Full Stack Developer with 5 years of experience. Proficient in C#, SQL Server, Node.js, Python, Laravel, Vue.js, and AWS. Holds a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science (2020). Seeking to leverage my strong technical background and collaborate with an innovative team to create impactful solutions.

work.name: Intelligis Technologies
work.summary: Integral part of the technology development team, specializing in C#, JavaScript, and SQL Server. Significantly contributed to the development of SmartMap, an innovative web platform for optimizing delivery routes and last-mile logistics management. Enhanced customer experience by providing real-time progress reports and advanced tracking tools.

work.name: Nextwells Corporation
work.summary: Specialized Full Stack Developer with expertise in Node.js and JavaScript, focused on solutions for the energy sector. Collaborated on LongView, a trendsetting application for process optimization in the oil and gas industry. Pioneered efficiency improvements through advanced technologies, contributing to the digital transformation of the energy sector. Developed essential Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) for strategic decision-making in energy operations.

work.name: CODEORSHOP,C.A
work.summary: Developed with Laravel and Vue.js for Pasify, innovating Chilean transportation tracking and onboard services. Transformed the customer service experience.

education.institution: Universidad de Oriente, Nucleo Nueva Esparta
